rules_text: When Whiptail Manticore enters, search your library for a basic land card and a Lair card, reveal them, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text:
[i]“He may look frightenin', but don't you worry. He wouldn't hurt a fly, ‘nless that fly shot at him with a McCall .38.”
—Marshal “Hawkeye” Hayes[/i]
